column2: At what time did the 12:23 p.m. S-line bus proceeding in the direction of Porte de Champerret arrive on that day? "At 12:38 p.m." "Were there many people on the aforesaid S-bus?" "Bags of 'em." "Did you particularly notice any of them?" "An individual who had a very a long neck and a plait round his hat."
